text: is a racing video game. It was made and published by Sega for the Sega Model 2 arcade machine in 1996, for the Sega Saturn in 1997 and for personal computers in 1998. It has four tracks, one can be opened when reaching the final stage of the season. == References == Category:1996 video games Category:1997 video games Category:1998 video games Category:Sega arcade games Category:Sega Saturn games Category:Windows games Category:Racing video games Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Sega Touring Car Championship
